helpText: í_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ő.

generic.title: í_Error updating categories__________________________ő
generic.message: í_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ő.

maxDepthExceeded.title: í_Error updating categories__________________________ő
maxDepthExceeded.message: í_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ő.

destinationHasSameName.title: í_Error updating categories__________________________ő
destinationHasSameName.message: í_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ő.

noSchema.title: í_Schema not found_________________ő
noSchema.message: í_Item schema not found for user_________________ő.

maxCharacter.title: í_Error updating categories__________________________ő
maxCharacter.message: í_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ő.

deleteInUseCategory.title: í_Delete category________________ő
deleteInUseCategory.message: í_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ő.

custom.title: í_Custom categories__________________ő
custom.message: í_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ő.

arcgis.title: í_ArcGIS categories__________________ő
arcgis.message: í_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ő.

iso.title: í_ISO categories_______________ő
iso.message: í_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ő.

inspire.title: í_INSPIRE categories___________________ő
inspire.message: í_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ő.
